INCORRECT_PARAMETERS_PASSED.name: INCORRECT_PARAMETERS_PASSED
INCORRECT_PARAMETERS_PASSED.message: Parameters passed to chaincode are invalid/incorrect.

VALIDATION_ERRORS_ENCOUNTERED.name: VALIDATION_ERRORS_ENCOUNTERED
VALIDATION_ERRORS_ENCOUNTERED.message: Validation errors were encountered while parsing the provided data to chaincode.

UNKNOWN_METHOD_ERROR.name: UNKNOWN_METHOD_ERROR
UNKNOWN_METHOD_ERROR.message: The provided function name/ method does not exist.

UNKNOWN_CHAINCODE_OPERATION_TYPE.name: UNKNOWN_CHAINCODE_OPERATION_TYPE
UNKNOWN_CHAINCODE_OPERATION_TYPE.message: The provided chaincode operation does not exist. It should be of the type 'invoke' or 'query'.

CHAINCODE_ERROR.name: CHAINCODE_ERROR
CHAINCODE_ERROR.message: A chaincode error occured while processing the transaction.

KEY_NOT_FOUND.name: KEY_NOT_FOUND
KEY_NOT_FOUND.message: The provided record id/key could not be found.

UNKNOWN_DATA_CATEGORY.name: UNKNOWN_DATA_CATEGORY
UNKNOWN_DATA_CATEGORY.message: The provided data/asset category cannot be found or is incorrect.
